Suukie woke up on the bridge, damaged...he stood up and looked himself over,
then picked up his arm and walked back into the base, picking up the rifle
he picked up from the base on his way.....he stpped into the CR Chamber, but
it said he was already repaired.....he walked out and reattached his arm, he
was mangled and bloody, but the CR Chamber said that he was already
repaired, so he walked out of the base, sliding past Stinkbomb on the bridge
carefully....and walked out, leaving a trail of mech fluid behind
him......he walked off into the distance, and seen an unusual
structure.....Plintissa was building this, and it was known as the Allies
base....Plintissa's new team was to be known as the Allies......they were
Allies to the Maximals for now, but that could quickly change......Suukie
walked up to Plintissa... "i'll help you with your base....there will
however, be no race...." Suukie said, staring at Plintissa.......so all 3 of
them started building together, Dracona included......before long, the base
was finished, and the Allies were born.....including a working CR
Chamber..however, the bases CR Chamber, just like the one at the Maximals
base, sais Suukie was already repaired...so Suukie's unusual code had to be
installed into the Chamber.... "how come your code changed?...." Plintissa
asked... "well, i guess it's the damage i took.....back there i was
hooked...my own comradde betrayed me, when i tried to help him he shot me,
you see...." Suukie said......Dracona linked her lab to this base. "what
about the Alliance?...." Plintissa asked... "don't worry, i'll still be with
them, but no saying that i cannot have friends here...." Dracona
said....Plintissa gave a thumbs up to Dracona and they sat at the base,
waiting for new members......they sat and looked at each other, becoming
grumpier by the second from the waiting...... "we need some members...."
Plintissa said......so the 3 of them set out to fid some members for this
new group.........
